DOC.brief_summary: Use SeQuent® Please drug coat balloon ( DCB ) effective treat patient in-stent restenosis ( ISR ) . However , whether type pre-dilatation balloon prior DCB dilatation impact clinical angiographic outcome unknown . Lacrosse® Non-slip element balloon ( NSE ) balloon catheter 3 longitudinal plastic element attach proximal distal balloon edge . NSE develop incise neointimal tissue avoid balloon slippage without vitiate balloon derivability crossability . We investigate angiographic clinical outcome follow normal non-compliant balloon NSE dilatation prior DCB dilatation ISR lesions.This study single blind , multicenter , randomize trial . Total 200 patient ISR randomly assign treat non-compliant balloon NSE DCB dilatation . Optical coherence tomographic ( OCT ) analysis perform pre-dilatation DCB dilatation Follow-up angiography analysis plan 8 month patient . Clinical follow-up plan 8 24 months.Primary endpoint angiographic in-segment late loss 8 month .
